field.filter: SELECT PowerConnection WHERE id != :this->id AND finalclass IN ('PowerSource','Transformateur','Onduleur','InverseurSource','ArmoireTGBT','ArmoireDistributionElect')
SELECT PowerConnection WHERE id != :this->id AND finalclass IN ('PowerSource','Transformateur','Onduleur','InverseurSource','ArmoireTGBT','ArmoireDistributionElect')
SELECT ArmoireDistributionElect WHERE id != :this->id AND location_id = :this->location_id
SELECT ArmoireDistributionElect WHERE id != :this->id AND location_id = :this->location_id

neighbour.query_down: SELECT InverseurSource WHERE powerA_id = :this->id OR powerB_id = :this->id
neighbour.query_up: SELECT PowerConnection WHERE id = :this->powerA_id OR id = :this->powerB_id

neighbour.query_down: SELECT ArmoireDistributionElect WHERE powerA_id = :this->id OR powerB_id = :this->id
neighbour.query_up: SELECT PowerConnection WHERE id = :this->powerA_id OR id = :this->powerB_id
